documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
Error 502 Ray ID: 601c0409ad1110c1 • 2020-12-15 00:23:24 UTC Bad gateway You Browser Working Copenhagen Cloudflare Working akshit.me Host Error What happened?

The web server reported a bad gateway error.

What can I do?

Please try again in a few minutes.

Cloudflare Ray ID: 601c0409ad1110c1 • Your IP: 87.212.135.148 • Performance &. security by Cloudflare

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
points.quoteText: Referring Page: This helps me with understanding where the website is getting the most number of audience from.

points.title: This service only uses temporary session cookies
points.quoteText: These cookies are stored on your browser for a period of 24 hours.

points.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
points.quoteText: The website uses cookies for providing me with non identifiable information about how you interact with my website and assists me in marketing efforts.

points.title: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service
points.quoteText: Note that if you disable cookies entirely, the website will continue to function properly

points.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
points.quoteText: None of the information that you share with me while interacting with the website will ever be shared with or sold to any entity under any circumstances.

points.title: The user is informed about security practices
points.quoteText: If you have any questions about the security of your personal information, you can contact me at questions@akshit.me.

points.title: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers
points.quoteText: The website respects the Do Not Track Header and will not log any data if you use it.

points.title: User feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
points.quoteText: If I make changes to this Policy that I believe materially impact the privacy of your personal information, I will promptly provide notice of any such changes (and, where necessary, obtain consent), as well as post the updated Policy on this website

points.title: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it
points.quoteText:
I take all reasonable steps to protect information received from you from loss, misuse or unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration and/or destruction.
I have put in place appropriate physical, technical and administrative measures to safeguard and secure your information, and I make use of privacy-enhancing technologies such as encryption.

points.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
points.quoteText: None of the information that you share with me while interacting with the website will ever be shared with or sold to any entity under any circumstances.

points.title: The service deletes tracking data after a period of time and allows you to opt out
points.quoteText:
All user data is stored for a period of 12 hours after they visit the site. This is the bare minimum time required to analyze statistics.

Opting Out and Deletions

You may completely opt out of having your data stored by disabling all cookies. If you wish to have your data purged off the server you may write to me at admin@akshit.me.
